meanings.definition: Dishes, plates, cups, and other items used for serving and eating food.
meanings.sent1: The dinnerware in the cabinet is neatly stacked.
meanings.sent2: She set the table with elegant dinnerware for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The dinnerware decided to have a party in the cupboard when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The dinnerware gleamed under the soft kitchen lights like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking dinnerware filled the dining room as the family enjoyed their meal.

meanings.definition: The set of items used for serving and eating food at a meal.
meanings.sent1: Every household should have a complete set of dinnerware.
meanings.sent2: The hostess displayed the beautiful dinnerware on the dining table.
meanings.sent3: The dinnerware set whispered secrets to each other when no one was around.
meanings.sent4: The dinnerware set was a symphony of colors and patterns on the table.
meanings.sent5: The delicate dinnerware set added a touch of elegance to the dinner party.
